title: SOLD!!!   1909 Tigers Dietsche Postcard with Cobb
author: ser1979

posts.post_title: SOLD!!!   1909 Tigers Dietsche Postcard with Cobb
posts.post_content: Fresh from PSA!!! Only going to leave this up for a week. If it doesn't sell then I'm going to crack it out of the case and send to SGC. I have no clue why this was only graded an A by PSA. There is no stamp on the back, only writing. I am asking $1,100 OBO. No trades. Paypal preferred.
